songs.title: Love Me Like You (Bimbo Jones Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: All]
Can't love me like you

[Verse 1: Jade Thirlwall]
He might got the biggest ca-a-ar
Don't mean he can drive me wild or he can go for miles
Said he got a lot of ca-a-ash
Darling he can't buy my love, it's you I'm dreaming of

[Chorus: All]
Last night I lay in bed so blue
Cause I realized the truth‚ they can't love me like you
I've tried to find somebody new
Baby they ain't got a clue‚ can't love me like you
Can't love me like you

[Break: All]
Sha-la-la-la
Sha-la-la-la
Sha-la-la-la
Sha-la-la-la
Sha-la-la-la
Sha-la-la-la

[Bridge: All]
L-O-V-E‚ when you're with me
L-O-V-E, when you're with me

[Verse 2: Jesy Nelson]
Used to get it when I wa-a-ant
You were pouring out your love, I could never get enough
Now I'm dealing with these boys
When I really need a man who can do it like I can

[Chorus: All]
Last night I lay in bed so blue
Cause I realized the truth‚ they can't love me like you
I've tried to find somebody new
Baby they ain't got a clue, can't love me like you

[Break: All]
Sha-la-la-la
Sha-la-la-la
Sha-la-la-la
Sha-la-la-la
Sha-la-la-la
Sha-la-la-la

[Chorus: All, Perrie Edwards, Jesy Nelson, Leigh-Anne Pinnock, (All + Jade Thirlwall)]
Last night I lay in bed so blue (I lay in bed so blue)
Cause I realized the truth, they can't love me like you (They can't love me like you)
I've tried to find somebody new (Ooh‚ woo, ooh)
Baby they ain't got a clue, can't love me like you (Can't love me like you)
Last night I lay in bed so blue (L-O-V-E, love the way you give it to me)
Cause I realized the truth, they can't love me like you (When you're with me, boy, I want it everyday)
I've tried to find somebody new
Baby they ain't got a clue, can't love me like you
